name: Cat & Cow
instruction: On all fours, round then arch your back

name: Child's Pose
instruction: From kneeling, reach your arms forward

name: Knee Hug
instruction: Lying on your back, pull one knee to your chest (30s each side)

name: Spinal Twist
instruction: Lying on your back, drop your knees to one side (30s each side)

name: Standing Forward Bend
instruction: Stand and bend forward, slight knee bend is OK

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
instruction: In a lunge position, shift weight forward (30s each side)

name: Glute Stretch
instruction: Seated, place one ankle on the opposite knee and lean forward (30s each side)

name: Shoulder Rolls
instruction: Roll both shoulders in large circles
